bibl.title: Notes on Eight Plays of Menander.
bibl.note: Miscellaneous notes on five plays (Dis Exapaton, Encheiridion, Hero, Theophoroumene, Karchedonios). - Further notes on the Epitrepontes. - Notes on the Georgos. - Notes on the Kitharistes.
bibl.seg: Arnott W. Geoffrey, Notes on Eight Plays of Menander.
Miscellaneous notes on five plays (Dis Exapaton, Encheiridion, Hero, Theophoroumene, Karchedonios). - Further notes on the Epitrepontes. - Notes on the Georgos. - Notes on the Kitharistes.
